title: Tales from Silver Lands
text:
Tales from Silver Lands is a book by <a href="Charles%20Finger">Charles Finger</a> that won the <a href="Newbery%20Medal">Newbery Medal</a> in 1925.
The book is a collection of nineteen <a href="Fable">folktales</a> of the native populations of <a href="Central%20America">Central</a> and <a href="South%20America">South America</a>. Collected during Finger's travels, it was one of the first volumes of South American indigenous folktales available to children. Finger also includes information about how the tales were told, including some cultural norms, and any items used in telling the story.
